ygData.subject: Re: list and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Also, during multiple attackes, or need that ultimate taunt? Fear spells will get it off the mage, it will also get it off you, giving your healer that
ygData.messageBody:
Also, during multiple attackes, or need that ultimate taunt? Fear spells
will get it off the mage, it will also get it off you, giving your healer
that valuable time to get yer heal, and the casters xtra time to nuke. Use
fear, it is perhaps your greatest spell.

----- Original Message -----
From: Chris <roysca@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:38 AM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] list and stuff


> From: "Chris" <roysca@...>
>
> That was a really good response Beld. I currently play an ogre
shadowknight
> lvl 22 on Povar. I haven't really tried the fear and then chase to get a
> few hits in, but I definitly like the sound of it. I normally hit with a
> darkness spell, then a str sapping spell and melee away. My warrior side
is
> much better than my spell casting side, so I play the tank mostly. I
always
> try to group with a cleric if possible. Also, I TOTALLY agree with having
> your pet, I even try to get one when in a group. This morning I was
> fighting in Highpass Hold (MY GOD, how many do I have to kill before I can
> go into HH :) ) and they drop a lot of the rusty weapons. I gave my pet
a
> rusty mace and he was hitting in the range of 15-18. Very nice little
> addition.
>
> I have almost full bronze on finally, with a few exceptions. I have a
> grotesque mask, and I finally got a greater zweihander (sp), which reminds
> me, i'm selling a 2handed well balanced, magical axe on that server which
> normally sells for about 550 from the shady guy in the ecommons/nro
tunnel.
> I'm selling it for around 300 if anyone is interested. I am also curious
as
> to what type of armour/items other ogre sk's are wearing and any
suggestoins
> they might have.
>
> Chris/Barto.
>
>
>
>
>

> > From: Tony Donatelli [mailto:d1ng0@...]

The

> > things in
> > game now that I know you're there. =)
> >
> > Thanks again, man.
> > Dravith (13)
> >
> > PS: Also, any character descriptions I'd love to hear. Tell me about
your
> > race, level, equipment, weapon, favorite spells, etc. I just wanna hear
> > about other SKs, what they're wearing, how they're living... Thanks.
> >
